entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Rain showers beginning this evening then changing to periods of freezing rain before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
